channel.title: Full data feed
channel.description: This is the main feed for your online product data for Google Shopping and should be submitted at least every 30 days.

item.title: 12 Oz. Glass Sugar Pourers with Chrome Flap Tops, 12 Pieces
item.description: Adding sugar to your beverage? Sugar packets can be a hassle, but keep sugar close at hand with this 12-ounce fluted glass sugar pourer. Featuring a stainless steel lid with a self-closing side flap for controlled pouring, this pourer serves as the perfect tabletop accessory for several uses with fewer refills.

item.title: 12 Oz. Glass Sugar Pourers with Chrome Perforated Tops, 12 Pieces
item.description: A great alternative to a bulky jar of sugar, hold a generous 12 ounces of various condiments in this fluted glass sugar pourer. Its stainless steel perforated top is great for dispensing a desired amount of any product from sugar to grated parmesan cheese to your favorite spices. Featuring a traditional design, this shaker will add a vintage touch to your table setting.

item.title: 6 Oz. Oil & Vinegar Cruets, 12 Pieces
item.description: Display your finest liquid condiments in this simple yet elegant oil and vinegar cruet. This cruet is great for storing and for adding a dash of oil and vinegar, dressings, sauces, and light syrups. Constructed from glass featuring a stainless steel top with a pour spout and a holding capacity of 6 ounces, this stylish addition is perfect for any table and decor.

item.title: 6 Oz. Glass Cheese Shakers with Chrome Perforated Tops, 12 Pieces
item.description: Add a delicious accent to any meal using this 6-ounce shaker. The perforated chrome top features holes big enough for crushed pepper, but small enough to dispense a controlled amount of grated cheese and other seasonings. Ideal for casual dinners, the whimsical swirl glass design fashions a thoughtful presentation.

item.title: 6 Oz. Glass Cheese Shakers with Chrome Slotted Tops, 12 Pieces
item.description: Cheese and pepper lovers, keep your favorite toppings and condiments neatly stored and readily accessible in this striking cheese shaker! Featuring a swirl-glass pattern base and three wide slots on a chrome top, it's great for shaking larger portions onto meals and keeping cheeses from sticking. Its 6-ounce size doesn't take up much table space, but allows everyone at the table to get their flavorful share.

item.title: 12 Oz. BPA-Free Rustic Fiesta Molcajete Salsa Plate, 2 Pack
item.description: Give your signature side dishes and appetizers a professional presentation with this black molcajete salsa plate. A great serving piece, this plate will keep foods at an ideal temperature for serving and enhance the taste and quality of your dish. Perfect for serving salsa, guacamole, and other delicious dips, it adds an authentic touch to any tabletop.

item.title: 2 Piece Taco Server Set
item.description: Taco Tuesday just got more festive with this taco server! Equipped with four compartments, tacos sit securely, ensuring all of the contents remain in the shell. A handle on each side makes carrying this server from the kitchen to the fiesta a breeze. The rustic charcoal coloring of this server will seamlessly blend into your decor while the tacos both stand upright and stand out!

item.title: Black Rectangular Poly Woven Baskets with Handles, 19" x 14" x 4", 3 Pack
item.description:
Stylishly serve anything from muffins and dinner rolls to pastries and fruit, deliver a decorative basket of treats, nicely display soaps, or store household products in our rectangular solid cord poly woven baskets. An everyday staple, these versatile baskets are a great addition to any home. The reinforced weaving on rim and base provides added durability and the two carrying handles are great for support. Baskets are easily stackable and can be cleaned by wiping down or tossing into the dishwasher. Available in two colors.

*Please note -- this item does not qualify for free shipping.

item.title: 12 Qt. Clear Polycarbonate Square Storage Container with Graduation Markings
item.description: Ideal for the storage and transport of both raw and cooked food, this 12-quart square food storage container is a handy kitchen essential. Crafted from clear polycarbonate plastic, it is break-resistant and extremely durable. It can withstand temperatures from -40 degrees Fahrenheit to 210 degrees Fahrenheit, allowing it to be used in both refrigerators and freezers. Featuring built-in handles with color graduations on the outside in liters and quarts for accurate measuring, this container takes the guesswork out of proper portioning. For added convenience, this food storage container is dishwasher safe. Available in multiple sizes, choose the one to suit your kitchen needs. Use the corresponding lid to preserve the freshness of the products you store in this particular container.

item.title: Hardwood Coat Hangers, 12 Pack
item.description: Effortlessly organize your closet by neatly hanging your apparel on these sturdy wood hangers. Equipped with a bar, this is the perfect hanger for jeans, dress pants and suits. These hangers are also ideal to air dry delicates while keeping their shape. Small notches on each side of the hanger ensure thinly strapped tops don't slide off. With a dozen of these wood hangers, keeping your closets well-organized is an easy task.
item.g:product_type: Homekeeping > Organization and Cleaning > Office Supplies

item.title: Multi-Surface Non-Electric Rotary Sweeper
item.description: Easily clean tiled kitchen floors to carpeted living room floors with the multi-surface sweeper. The single bristle brush picks up dirt, lint, straws, hair and crumbs, depositing it into the debris pan. The lay flat handle allows the multi-surface sweeper to reach hard places such as under the bed or couch. To clean out the multi-surface sweeper, simply open the debris pan and empty into a trash can. Lightweight and compact, the multi-surface is easily stored in a storage or broom closet.
item.g:product_type: Homekeeping > Organization and Cleaning > Cleaning Supplies

item.title: Heavy-Duty Natural Latex Gloves, 10-1/2" x 18-1/2", Pair
item.description: Keep your hands dry and protected while washing dishes and scrubbing pots with these heavy-duty natural latex gloves. Made of a heavy-duty latex material, these gloves are soft to the touch and comfortable to wear for a long period of time. The durable material allows for a variety of uses, so reach for them when working in the garden or preparing to wash your car. With an 18" length, these heavy-duty natural latex gloves not only protect your hands but your forearms as well.
item.g:product_type: Homekeeping > Organization and Cleaning > Cleaning Supplies

item.title: 3' x 5' Charcoal Carpet Floor Mat
item.description: Help guests, patrons and employees make a safe entrance way placing this grey charcoal carpet by the front door to absorb dirt and moisture. The olefin fiber material is fade-resistant and capable of holding more than one gallon of water per square yard. Grooves in the carpet help remove dirt, mud and debris from the bottom of shoes, while fibers trap dirt and moisture to protect floors. Non-slip vinyl backing ensures the carpet lays flat and prevents curling or rippling. Ideal for high-volume kitchens and outdoor parties, this rug offers a safe walking path in slippery areas. This carpet is easy to keep clean with a hose, broom or vacuum. This carpet is available in three different sizes to fit your needs.
item.g:product_type: Homekeeping > Organization and Cleaning > Office Supplies

item.title: 3' x 5' Burgundy Carpet Floor Mat
item.description: Create a safe entry way with this durable carpet. Made of olefin fiber, this carpet is fade resistant and is able to hold more than one gallon of water per square yard. The grooved design helps remove dirt, mud and other debris from the bottom of shoes. The non-slip vinyl backing prevents the carpet from curling or ripping and ensures it lays flat for safe footing. Use this carpet in slippery areas to create a safe walking area. This lightweight carpet can be easily cleaned with a hose, broom or vacuum to effectively remove debris. The durable construction of this carpet is ideal for both indoor and outdoor use. Available in an attractive burgundy, this carpet comes in three different sizes to fit your needs.
item.g:product_type: Homekeeping > Organization and Cleaning > Office Supplies

item.title: 7" Triple-Riveted Santoku Knife with Fully Forged Full Tang German Steel Blade
item.description: A combination of style and practicality, the Santoku knife is a vital tool for a variety of cutting tasks. Create paper-thin slices of garlic and onions with ease as the hallowed edge pattern releases the thin slices from the blade. The blade is heat-treated for optimal blade sharpness, permitting you to slice, dice and mince foods with precision. Forged from a single piece of high-carbon German steel, this knife resists rust and corrosion which allows the blade to stay sharper longer. Carefully engineered for the perfect weight balance, the fully forged tang is riveted to the polymer handle for added durability and control.

item.title: 8" Triple-Riveted Chef's Knife with Fully Forged Full Tang Blade
item.description: Ease the tedious task of meal prepping with the proper tools. This 8” professional-grade chef’s knife is designed to minimize difficult cutting tasks such as chopping large pieces of meat or slicing through tough exteriors of fruits and vegetables. Featuring a heat-treated blade, this chef’s knife offers exceptional slicing, dicing, mincing, and chopping. Forged from a single full tang high-carbon German steel, this knife resists rust and corrosion and is ideal for everyday use. Ergonomically designed, the contoured polymer handle is riveted for added durability and the weight balance offers excellent control.

item.title: 10" Triple-Riveted Chef's Knife with Fully Forged Full Tang German Steel Blade
item.description: A superior cutlery tool, this 10” chef’s knife is the ultimate instrument to prep any meal. Whether you are dicing onions, slicing steaks, or carving poultry, the heat-treated blade offers precision for any cutting task. Forged from a single piece of full tang high-carbon German steel, this knife resists rust and corrosion, making it ideal for everyday use. Contoured to comfortably rest in the palm of the hand, the durable polymer handle is riveted for added durability. The optimal weight balance provides ease of use and control that all chefs desire.

item.title: 10" Triple-Riveted Granton Edge Slicer with Fully Forged Full Tang German Steel Blade
item.description: Carving can be a simple task when equipped with the proper tools. Slice through the tough outer skin of any poultry, roast, or fish by using this professional-grade granton edge slicer. The granton pattern found on the edge of the blade creates tiny air pockets for fast and easy cutting and prevents food from sticking to the blade. Fully forged from a single piece of high-carbon German steel to resists stains and corrosion, the tang extends through the polymer handle and is triple-riveted for added durability. Precisely weighted for optimal balance, this elegantly designed granton edge slicer works well with the carving fork, delivering perfectly sliced meat every time.

item.title: 10" Triple-Riveted Fish / Roast Granton Edge Slicer with Fully Forged Full Tang German Steel Blade
item.description: Whether you’re carving a ham for the holidays or slicing an oven roasted fish for dinner, this granton edge slicer delivers perfect slices of meat with one swift motion. The granton pattern on the edge of the blade creates tiny air pockets to minimize drag for cleaner and more precise cuts and to allow juices to flow through so that the meat slides right off the knife. The 10" single piece of high-carbon German steel is fully forged and triple-riveted to the polymer handle for added durability. Carefully crafted to offer optimal weight distribution, this stylish slicer offers superior performance in any kitchen. Pair this fish/roast granton edge slicer with the carving fork for perfectly even slices of meat every time.

item.title: 12" Triple-Riveted Chef's Knife with Fully Forged Full Tang German Steel Blade
item.description: Any professional chef would contend that this 12” chef’s knife is an indispensable tool in any kitchen. Featuring a heat-treated blade, this knife is ideal for dicing vegetables, slicing fish, cubing large chunks of beef, and carving a holiday ham with ease and efficiency. The high-carbon German steel blade is forged from a single full tang attached to a durable polymer handle that is triple-riveted for added durability. Carefully engineered for optimal weight balance, this chef’s knife rests comfortably in the palm of the hand and provides exceptional control while slicing and dicing.

item.title: 14" Premium Oval Magnetic Sharpening Steel
item.description: To ensure optimal performance from your fine cutlery, use this round premium sharpening steel to quickly and easily hone and realign the knife’s edge. With the steel’s magnetic core, shavings adhere onto the sharpening steel during the sharpening process, preventing any loose debris from sticking to the knives and contaminating the food. The ergonomically designed handle fits comfortably in the palm of the hand and features a metal loop for to hang for convenient storage.

item.title: 12" Sharpening Steel
item.description: Maintain the sharpness of your knife’s blade by using this stainless steel sharpening steel. The ideal tool for straight-edged kitchen knives, this sharpening steel can also be used to maintain hunting knives and switch blades. This sharpening steel is equipped with an oversized handle that fits comfortably in the hand and protects during the sharpening process. The handle also features a metal loop to hang for convenient storage.

item.title: Chinese Cleaver with 8" Blade and POM Handle
item.description: Preparing dinner should be a breeze and it could be if you stock your kitchen with the proper tools. This Chinese cleaver is a multi-functional knife that can handle many tasks. The thin razor-sharp blade is ideal for chopping vegetables or slicing through boneless meats for precise cuts while the spine is great for pounding and tenderizing chicken or steak to optimize the flavor and succulence of the meat. Turn the cleaver on its side and use the wide edge to crush garlic and ginger to extract essential oils and flavors and then use the cleaver to scoop up the ingredients off the board and place into the pan. Meticulously crafted for the ultimate weight balance to reduce hand fatigue and provide greater control, the POM handle is designed to fit comfortably in the palm of the hand to ensure a safe and comfortable grip during food prep.

item.title: 24" Magnetic Knife Holder, Wooden Base
item.description: Create an efficient work space by mounting this wooden magnetic knife bar on the wall to store cutlery safely above your countertop and within hand’s reach. Keep paring knives close by to peel or trim fruit or have your chef’s knife handy when you need to quickly dice, slice or mince vegetables. This wooden magnetic bar provides safe storage for your knives that may not fit into the butcher block such as your meat or Chinese cleavers. A beautifully crafted knife bar, it can easily be mounted on most surfaces and adds a handsome charm to any kitchen. This wooden magnetic knife bar is available in three different sizes to accommodate food preparation needs.

item.title: White Rectangular Cutting Board, 12" x 18" x 1"
item.description: Prepare a rack of ribs for the neighborhood barbecue with this heavy-duty white rectangular cutting board. This 1" thick board offers more stability while chopping and butchering ingredients. The large surface space is ideal for slicing large roasts or carving a turkey. The plastic construction will not dull the edge of the knife while the non-porous material resists stains and absorption of flavors and odors for easy cleaning.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Prep Tools > Cutting Boards

item.title: White Grooved Rectangular Cutting Board, 15" x 20" x 1/2"
item.description: With its sleek design and round edges, our generous white grooved cutting board can handle a full range of food preparation tasks. Slice a delicious roast with confidence, as the built-in well surrounding the board is designed to catch juices or fluids. Our cutting boards are gentle on your fine knives and offer higher efficiency when prepping ingredients. With its non-porous material, this cutting board makes cleaning up a quick and easy endeavor.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Prep Tools > Cutting Boards

item.title: Hardwood Rectangular Cutting Board, 12" x 18"
item.description: Beautiful and functional, this wooden cutting board is designed to protect the sharpest blades and is crafted for heavy-duty use. Created for bakers of all cakes, this 3-piece professional-grade premium non-stick pan set offers a variety of sizes for your sweet and savory desserts. This versatile set can also be used to bake cheesy lasagna and cook up a roast dinner to pair with your desserts. The aluminized steel design offers superior heat transfer to bake your dishes evenly throughout, while the Quantum2 coating offers easy release every time. These pans feature a wire-in reinforced rim to keep them from warping over time.

Set Includes:

  • Deluxe Aluminized Steel Professional Non-Stick Rectangular Cake Pan, 13" x 9" x 2-1/4"
  • Deluxe Aluminized Steel Professional Non-Stick Square Cake Pan, 8" x 8" x 2-1/4"
  • Deluxe Aluminized Steel Professional Non-Stick 1 Lb. Loaf Pan, 8-1/2" x 4-1/2" x 2-3/4"

item.title: Muffin and Loaf Pan Set with 1 Qt. Measuring Cup
item.description:
Measure just the right amount of oil and milk to bake your homemade yellow cake with this muffin and loaf pan set with a 1 Qt. measuring cup. Ideal for the occasional baker, this professional-grade premium non-stick muffin pan and loaf pan also offers a variety of everyday uses such as baking delicious egg frittatas for breakfast, stuffed lasagna for lunch, and savory meatloaf for dinner. With the added bonus of the measuring cup, you won’t have any shortage of necessary ingredients in your evenly-baked dishes.

Set Includes:

  • Deluxe Carbon Steel Professional Non-Stick 12 Cup (3 Oz. / Cup) Muffin Pan
  • Deluxe Aluminized Steel Professional Non-Stick 1 Lb. Loaf Pan, 8-1/2" x 4-1/2" x 2-3/4"
  • Deluxe Stackable Break-Resistant Plastic 1 Quart Measuring Cup with Color Graduations

item.title: Revol 1768 White Espresso Tumbler Crumple Cup
item.description: Made from porcelain, you’ll find yourself reaching for this white espresso cup to kick-start your morning with the rich taste of coffee. The crumpled design of the cup gives it a unique style that is both simple and artistic. Crafted from a disposable plastic cup reproduced into porcelain, this cup retains heat and can be used to bake a single muffin, cake, or your other favorite oven-baked dessert. With the added benefit of being microwave safe, you can grab this cup to heat yourself a batch of oatmeal or reheat chicken noodle soup any time you want. If you don’t want to use this versatile dish for coffee or baking, it also makes the ideal cup for enjoying refreshing scoops of chocolate ice cream on a hot summer day. For added convenience, this cup is freezer, microwave, oven, and dishwasher safe. Available in a variety of sizes and colors to best suit your preference. Capacity 2-3/4 Oz.

item.title: 3 Piece Stainless Steel Barbecue Tool Set, Rounded Handles
item.description:
With all the necessary tools needed to satisfy your afternoon barbecue guests, this 3-piece set will become your most convenient go-to. The stainless steel design gives the set a modern look that will match perfectly with your stainless steel grill. Use the spatula to slide a greasy burger onto a fluffy bun or the pot fork to easily transfer grilled zucchini onto a plate. The long handles ensure that your hands and arms are always at a safe distance from the grill to prevent burns. For added convenience, this barbecue set is dishwasher safe.

Set Includes: 
  • One Spatula – 18” Length; 1.5mm Thickness
  • One Pot Fork – 16-3/4” Length; 1.5mm Thickness
  • One Tong – 16-3/8” Length; 1.5mm Thickness

item.title: 3 Piece Stainless Steel Barbecue Tool Set with Rosewood Handles
item.description:
Add some elegance to your barbecue with this essential 3-piece tool set. The stainless steel and ergonomic rosewood handles will complement any grill while efficiently getting the job done. Designed for your convenience, you can save yourself the use of extra tools by using the spatula’s knife-edge to slice yourself a piece of cheese when you’re craving a juicy cheeseburger. The large spatula face is also ideal for potatoes and other vegetables, making it easy to remove them from the grill. With the tongs or pot fork to quickly serve your family and friends, you’ll be able to sit back and enjoy the weather and company in no time. For added convenience, this set is dishwasher safe.

Set Includes:
  • One Spatula – 17-13/16” Length; 1.5mm Thickness
  • One Pot Fork – 15-1/2” Length; 1.5mm Thickness
  • One Tong – 15” Length; 1.5mm Thickness

item.description:

item.title: 10-Piece Round Vacuum Glass Container Set
item.description:
An aesthetic necessity in every kitchen, this durable 10-piece round vacuum glass container set is excellent for the storage of all food. Tight fitting lids and vacuum seals guarantee to keep your dry ingredients and leftovers fresh, so spoiling food is no longer a concern. The round design allows you to stack the containers one on top of the other, saving you space in your pantry, refrigerator, and freezer. With the safety and convenience of using glass, you can pop the containers straight from the fridge into the microwave for quick heating and into the dishwasher for easy cleaning. item.title: 7 Piece Nylon Utensil Set
item.description:
Crafted to give you superior comfort whether cooking, stirring, turning, or serving, this 7 piece utensil set is exceptional for everyday use in your kitchen. Use the pieces to quickly whisk your morning eggs and effortlessly flip your blueberry pancakes to get them just right. Even homemade chicken noodle soup is just steps away when using the spoons and ladle to stir the flavors together and serve a hearty lunch. Ergonomic contoured handles paired with the knowledge that nylon is heat-resistant up to 410 degrees Fahrenheit allow you to lean the utensils on the hot cookware after serving. This set is perfect for use with non-stick cookware and bakeware, as it keeps their surface scratch-free. For the utmost convenience, you can pop the utensils into the dishwasher for efficient cleaning and then hang them for easy storage. This set is ideal for stocking a new kitchen or to present as a gift to your favorite culinary artist.

Set Includes:
  • One Nylon Slotted Spoon 13-1/2”
  • One Nylon Solid Spoon 13-1/2”
  • One Nylon Slotted Turner 13-1/2”
  • One Nylon Solid Turner 13-1/2”
  • One Nylon Fork 14-1/4”
  • One Nylon Whisk 12-1/2”
  • One Nylon Ladle 13”
